ie.gmit.sw

Class ProxyServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ie.gmit.sw.ProxyServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Server

    public class ProxyServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Server
    ProxyServer is an implementation of Server. This is the proxy server that is responsible for connecting to the main server, this is used as a gateway if authentication is met. This allows a client to simply use this class to use the main server. The methods here are just delegated to the main server - this is just used as a gateway to the main server if condition is met.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ProxyServer()
      Constructor creates an instance of ServerImpl.

    • Method Detail

      • authenticate

        public boolean authenticate(java.lang.String title,
                            java.lang.String firstLine)
        Description copied from interface: Server
        Used as error handling that returns true if the title and firstLine of the document exists. This is used for the proxy mainly to ensure that the server does not start creating documents if there is no valid input.
        Specified by:
        authenticate in interface Server
        Parameters:
        title - The title of the document
        firstLine - a BufferedReader of the first line of the document
        Returns:
        true if title and firstLine exist, false if title and firstLine don't exist

                  throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: Server
        Is the class responsible for delegating work to the Documentor to parse the file.
        Specified by:
        readDocument in interface Server
        Parameters:
        title - Used to add a title to document to be processed and stored
        br - Used to add content to the document to be processed and stored

      • compareSim

        public double compareSim()
        Description copied from interface: Server
        Is the class responsible for delegating the work to the SimilarityCalculator to calculate the similarity of the document parsed in processDocument() against all other documents.
        Specified by:
        compareSim in interface Server
        Returns:
        A value of 0-1 * 100 to represent the precentile of similarity.

      • finish

      • process

        public double process(java.lang.String title,
                      java.io.BufferedReader br,
                      HashingMethod hashingMethod)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: Server
        This method is responsible for calling all the other messages in order, this is to allow the client to simply call Process instead of all of the commands above (except authenticate). Seemed like a better way of doing things plus it makes this server look more like a facade.
        Specified by:
        process in interface Server
        Parameters:
        title - Title of the document
        br - BufferedReader containing the contents of the document
        hashingMethod - Enum to distinguish what hashingMethod to use
        Returns:
        A value of 0-1 * 100 to represent the precentile of similarity.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - For File operations
